tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have had really bad experiences with a few doctors in the past *** ******* * ****** **** **** **** ******* ** ***** ***** * *** *** ******* ****** ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* *** *** **** *** **** ********* **** ***** He is caring, he gives time to his patients, he follows up from time to time, he listens to your problem and suggests the best course of action, he doesn't over charge for anything, he will tell you everything as it is and his consultation fees is so reasonable that everyone can afford to visit him.
His wife Dr. Mrs. Desai is equally amazing.
Their clinic is so spik and span. Each and every hygiene standards are followed thoroughly. I have never seen any doctor follow all the precautions and rules the way Dr. Desai does. You are safe in his hands is what i can vouch for.
I will definitely recommend Dr. Desai to everyone. ** ** *** *****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr. Jasmit Desai briefly explains the treatment, also reschedules the appointment without hesitation and does regular follow up with patients. He makes you very  comfortable during the treatment and also gives long term solutions to maintain good dental health.Special Thanks to him, for giving dental treatment during this pandemic situation, following all safety measures like Sanitisation,PPE Kit,Masks,Gloves,Head cap,etc.I am very satisfied with my overall experience of his treatment, would highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Explains very well with full patience. Advices and how to protect the tooth. 
Clinic is very hygienic, 
Doctor has kept hand sanitizer before entering we need to sanitize our hands 
Then doctor gives us one pack which contains cap, gloves and mask which we need to wear it.
There is a machine kept in his clinic we need to keep our foot in that Machine and it gets covered with plastic .
Doctor gave me one form to fill about my details which I did

Doctor also wears ppt which makes him fully covered  and safe.

Very happy with his services.

I am regular and old client. 
Me and my mom and my sisters visit there as being permanent client.
The rates are reasonable  and affordable.

I suggest everyone to visit this clinic
